CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( APXT_CMQM__Link_Type__c , "PointMerge") , Hyperlink( "https://www.appextremes.com/apps/Conga/PointMerge.aspx" & "?sessionId=" & $Api.Session_ID & "&serverUrl=" & $Api.Partner_Server_URL_80 & "&id=" & Id & "&ReportId=" & APXT_CMQM__Report_Id__c & "&TemplateId=" & APXT_CMQM__Document_Template_Id__c & "&QueryId=" & SUBSTITUTE( APXT_CMQM__Query_Id__c , "User.Id", $User.Id ) & "&DefaultPDF=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__Default_to_PDF__c = true, "1", "") & "&fp0=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__Force_Output_as_PDF__c = true, "1", "") & "&lg0=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__LogWordBody__c = true, "1", "") & "&lg1=" & APXT_CMQM__Activity_Subject__c & "&lg2=" & TEXT( APXT_CMQM__Follow_up_Interval__c ) , "Launch Conga PointMerge" ) , Hyperlink( "https://www.appextremes.com/apps/Conga/Welcome.aspx" & "?sessionId=" & $Api.Session_ID & "&serverUrl=" & $Api.Partner_Server_URL_80 & "&ReportId=" & APXT_CMQM__Report_Id__c & "&CampaignId=" & APXT_CMQM__Campaign_Id__c & "&QueryId=" & SUBSTITUTE( APXT_CMQM__Query_Id__c , "User.Id", $User.Id ) & "&QueryId1=" & SUBSTITUTE( APXT_CMQM__Query_Id_1__c , "User.Id", $User.Id ) & "&DocTemplateId=" & APXT_CMQM__Document_Template_Id__c & "&LabelTemplateId=" & APXT_CMQM__Label_Template_Id__c & "&EnvTemplateId=" & APXT_CMQM__Envelope_Template_Id__c & "&bpw=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__Bypass_Wizard__c = true, "1", "") & "&DefaultPDF=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__Default_to_PDF__c = true, "1", "") & "&fp0=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__Force_Output_as_PDF__c = true, "1", "") & "&lg0=" & IF( APXT_CMQM__LogWordBody__c = true, "1", "") & "&lg1=" & APXT_CMQM__Activity_Subject__c & "&lg2=" & TEXT( APXT_CMQM__Follow_up_Interval__c ) , "Launch Conga Merge" ) )
CustomField.label: Launch
